Booyah

ELECTRONIC DISCLOSURE AND CONSENT AGREEMENT

 

Effective May 13, 2019

 

This Electronic Disclosure and Consent Agreement is provided by Surety Bank, DeLand, Florida, member of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (“FDIC”) (“Surety Bank”, the “Bank”) on behalf of NYMBUS Inc. (“Nymbus”), the program partner responsible for managing Booyahl bank accounts (“Booyah”).
en.auth.appDisclaimer.disclaimer02:
General

This Electronic Disclosure and Consent Agreement (“Electronic Consent Agreement”), applies to all communications for products and services offered by the Bank. You must agree to this Electronic Consent Agreement prior to accepting the Online Banking Agreement, which you must accept before you can use Booyah Online Banking Services.

Definitions
en.auth.appDisclaimer.disclaimer03:
The terms “we,” “us” and “Bank” refer to Nymbus and/or Surety Bank or any affiliate, agent, independent contractor or designee that we may, at our sole discretion, involve in the provision of the Booyah Online Services.

The terms “you” and “your” refer to the user of Booyah Online Services, whether singular or plural, who: (1) is an individual or entity that is the owner of an account or a party-in-interest of an account at the Bank or (2) is an individual authorized by an account owner or a party-in-interest to view account information or effect transactions in an account.

The term “Communication” means any customer agreements or amendments to those agreements, disclosures, notices, responses, transaction history, account statements, privacy policies and all other information related to your accounts at the Bank, including but not limited to Booyah Online Services. Communications are not limited to information that we are required by law to provide to you in writing.

Hardware Requirements
en.auth.appDisclaimer.disclaimer04:
In order to access, view, and retain electronic Communications that we make available to you, you must have:

A personal computer capable of running one of these compatible browsers:

* i. Opera version 12 or higher

* ii. Firefox version 38 or higher

* iii. Safari version 7 or higher

* iv. Chrome version 40 or higher

* v. Edge version 12 or higher
en.auth.appDisclaimer.disclaimer05:
OR

* An Apple iPhone or iPad running iOS version 9.0 or higher

* An Android phone running Android version 4.1 or higher

* Access to an active email account with an Email service provider

Scope of Communications to be Provided in Electronic Form
en.auth.appDisclaimer.disclaimer06:
When you use a Booyah Online Service, you agree that we may provide you with any Communications in electronic form only and that we may discontinue sending paper Communications to you. Withdrawal of your consent to receive Communications electronically shall terminate this Agreement, the Online Banking Agreement, and your access to Booyah Online Services. Your consent to receive electronic Communications and transactions includes, but is not limited to, the following:

* All transaction history statements regarding your accounts at the Bank;

All legal and regulatory disclosures and Communications associated with your accounts at the Bank including products or services available through Booyah Online Services and;;
en.auth.appDisclaimer.disclaimer07:
Notices or disclosures about a change in the terms of this Consent Agreement; and

Our responses to your requests related to your Accounts, including Booyah Online Services.

By agreeing to receive disclosures and notices electronically, you agree to provide us with the information necessary to communicate with you electronically (such as a current email address) and updated us with any changes in such information by calling or writing us at the number or address listed below.

Contact Information
en.auth.appDisclaimer.disclaimer08:

en.auth.appDisclaimer.disclaimer09:

en.checks.stopPayment.new.disclosure: Stop payments are not guaranteed, however we will make every attempt to complete your request. If the item was sent electronically or if we have already accepted the check for processing, we will not be able to stop the item.  The stop payment will remain in effect for the next 6 months and your account will be charged a stop payment fee for this service in accordance with your accounts fee schedule.  If you have any questions about the stop payment process call us at tel: (888) 597-7137.
